item.title: LfE 21: Season of Life… Under my Skin
item.description: 03/03/2010 Hello everyone, I’m halfway through my stay here in Edinburgh and every day brings me closer to the day I can come back home to Bangalore and hug my family.

item.title: The Woman
item.description: She is the wind you cannot capture, the fire you cannot hold, She has the strength of the earth but she flows She is a woman.

item.title: Earth
item.description: June 5th 2008: There is vulnerability In the bud, and Small new leaves. In all young, Newborns sprouting Into Life. There is freshness in Water- life-giving

item.title: The Shadow
item.description: Black and white, day and night. Contrasts. There can only be one when the other exists. So it is not all that strange that a bright light casts an intense shadow.
